content.text:
import pandas as pd
import ace_tools as tools

# Creating a structured table with relevant categories
data = [
    ["Sales & Work", "Runs commercial sales team at Lumina Solar (25% of business)"],
    ["Sales & Work", "Needs to triage the best solar projects due to limited installation resources (400 kW/month vs. 500 kW sold)"],
    ["Sales & Work", "Stopped selling in 2024 to train Shane Williams & Philip Jordan; they started generating sales in Q4 2024"],
    ["Sales & Work", "Needs to align with operations on pricing & project selection"],
    ["Sales & Work", "Needs to collaborate with marketing for materials, presentations, and website changes"],
    ["Sales & Work", "Needs to equip reps with materials and programs to prospect effectively"],
    ["Sales & Work", "Needs to update compensation plan for reps; current base salary is insufficient & commissions are slow"],
    ["Sales & Work", "Sales cycle is 6+ months, heavily dependent on financing sources"],
    ["Sales & Work", "Using Salesforce as CRM but dissatisfied; looking for a cross-platform solution for managing deals & tasks"],
    
    ["Sales Strategy", "Evaluating commercial solar proposal tools & considering website redesign for better SEO"],
    ["Sales Strategy", "Developing a discovery call template for Lumina Solar’s commercial division using MEDPICC framework"],
    ["Sales Strategy", "Interested in sales manager overrides in the solar industry"],
    ["Sales Strategy", "Analyzing impact of internal resources (onsite visits, permits, interconnection applications, project management)"],
    
    ["Technology & Productivity", "Setting up ClickUp"],
    ["Technology & Productivity", "Tried Todoist, Evernote, and OneNote but didn't find them suitable"],
    ["Technology & Productivity", "Uses Jira at work and dislikes it"],
    ["Technology & Productivity", "Needs help setting up Amazing Marvin, finds it complicated"],
    
    ["Personal & Interests", "Born on November 20, 1975, in Chicago, IL, at around 7 AM"],
    ["Personal & Interests", "Prefers using iPhone apps over browsing on the iPhone"],
    ["Personal & Interests", "Likes AI-generated music, such as Suno"],
    ["Personal & Interests", "Loves music, cologne, jeans, and sneakers"],
    ["Personal & Interests", "Likes songs with heavy bass and tempo similar to 'Freeze' by Kygo"],
    ["Personal & Interests", "Loves Halloween jokes"],
    ["Personal & Interests", "Enjoys cute Japanese cartoon characters"],
    ["Personal & Interests", "Planning a trip to Iceland (Dec 27 - Jan 1), wants to stay in a remote cabin & see northern lights"],
    ["Personal & Interests", "Looking for a more affordable northern lights trip, possibly in Scotland"],
    
    ["Family & Background", "From Ukraine"],
    ["Family & Background", "Son is applying to Boston College; both Mark and his wife are BC graduates"],
    ["Family & Background", "Son’s stepmother received the BC Arts Council Alumni Award"],
    ["Family & Background", "Mother, Lori Yates, worked with Paul Reed Smith on Concert for the Cure charity event"],
    
    ["Health & Challenges", "Has ADHD and is seeking better ways to work through concentration challenges"],
    ["Health & Challenges", "Recently quit Zyn pouches and is looking for a nicotine-free alternative"],
    
    ["Travel & Events", "Attended International Women in Brass Conference in Japan"],
    ["Travel & Events", "Preparing presentation for company's leadership on how everyone engages in sales"],
    
    ["Other", "Applying for a green card but facing a delay due to a name misspelling 14 years ago"],
    ["Other", "Has a World War II Japanese officer's sword"],
]

# Creating DataFrame
df = pd.DataFrame(data, columns=["Category", "Details"])

# Displaying the table
tools.display_dataframe_to_user(name="Compiled Data Table", dataframe=df)
